title: 622. Brian Billick Shares Coaching Experiences + Players or Draft Picks?
itunes:title: 622. Brian Billick Shares Coaching Experiences + Players or Draft Picks?
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the guys look at teams that recently traded draft picks for proven players and analyze this philosophy (7:41). Then, former Baltimore Ravens head coach Brian Billick joins, as he discusses the essential qualities to look for in a head coach, explains how power should be divided between a coach and the scouting department, and tells stories and experiences from his coaching days (16:40). Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
